summary: Small Edit I did to the RR Elphintos Red set
descriptionHtml:
K.o.B Armor style made from RR Elphintos. Just the Mesh, no Texture edit :P

Requirements: 
RR Elphintos UNP
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29690//?
UNP Body
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40156//?
Optional:
Osare Part Armor
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26503//?
I use the Red Shoulder and Knee Pieces sometimes :P

PM me bugs and ill patch as fast as I can!

Credit to:
Monpoko for RR Elphintos Armor
Anano for the Part Armor
FYI for UNP v2dot5
Me for taking off the shoulder armor XD (You could just go into Nifskope and do it but DL this if your lazy :L)
author: Monpoko
